*div1 type="summary"* *p*Thomas G. Western to Austin, Goliad, January 19, 1833. Transmitting copy of memorial to legislature for reform.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Goliad */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="01-19-1833">Jan. 19- 1833*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Col Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*D. Sir, I hasten before the Mail closes to communicate to you the import of A letter I have this Moment recd, from My *person_mentioned*friend */person_mentioned*at *location_mentioned*Mexico */location_mentioned*dated *date_mentioned n="12-26-1832">26 ult*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p*" *person_mentioned*Gen. Pedraza*/person_mentioned* with all the *person_mentioned*armies */person_mentioned*combined, now at *location_mentioned*Puebla */location_mentioned*and its vicinity will commence their March *date_mentioned n="01-20-1833">to Morrow*/date_mentioned* on the road to This *location_mentioned*Capital*/location_mentioned*, they amt. to *person_mentioned*13000 Men*/person_mentioned* and will come in without opposition—*person_mentioned*President Pedraza*/person_mentioned* was Sworn in and proclaimed as Such *date_mentioned n="01-18-1833">Yesterday */date_mentioned*in *location_mentioned*Puebla*/location_mentioned*— An order has been Made public that when he arrives *location_mentioned*within Six leagues of this City*/location_mentioned* *person_mentioned*every Military officer*/person_mentioned* here must present himself on pain of losing his rank and pay— Something Similar for all empleados— We consider the war at an end."*/p*
*p*The *person_mentioned*Ayuntamiento of this *location_mentioned*Town*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned* forward by this Mail to that of yours Copy of the Remonstrance Made to *person_mentioned*Congress */person_mentioned*in Sequence to that of *location_mentioned*Bejar*/location_mentioned*, it touches Stronger that its preceder on the division of the *location_mentioned*State */location_mentioned*and other topics and I think you will be pleased with the language used and the terms it is couched in and hope it will meet your ideas. Be pleased to favor me with your opinion on it as a whole—*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Thomas G. Western */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*/div1*
